FuncDef:
The mpls te tunnel-id command specifies the ID for a tunnel.
The undo tunnel-id command deletes the tunnel ID configured for a TE tunnel.
By default, no tunnel ID is configured for a TE tunnel.

ParaDef.Info:
Tunnel ID.
The value is an integer that ranges from 1 to 32768.

ExtraInfo:
Usage Scenario
A tunnel ID must be set for a tunnel; otherwise, the tunnel fails to be established. A tunnel ID is unique on a local device. Tunnels on the same device must have different tunnel IDs.
